name: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the major topics, theories, and approaches to the study of theater and performance.

name: Acting Fundamentals
description: This course covers the essential fundamentals of acting, including the development of acting skills and techniques.
prerequisites: Introduction to Theater and Performance Studies

name: Acting for the Camera
description: This course explores the unique challenges and opportunities of acting for the camera.

name: Advanced Acting
description: This course provides an in-depth study of acting techniques, the rehearsal process, and performance styles.
